ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong annual total on Bank IOMonthlyReporting
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Total of each year is only the last month total. on htdocs/compta/bank/annuel.php code is : ``` for ($mois = 1; $mois < 13; $mois++) { print ''; print "".dol_print_date(dol_mktime(1, 1, 1, $mois, 1, 2000), "%B").""; for ($annee = $year_start; $annee <= $year_end; $annee++) { $totsorties[$annee] = 0; $totentrees[$annee] = 0; ``` Seem to be better with : ``` for ($mois = 1; $mois < 13; $mois++) { print ''; print "".dol_print_date(dol_mktime(1, 1, 1, $mois, 1, 2000), "%B").""; $totsorties[$annee] = 0; $totentrees[$annee] = 0; for ($annee = $year_start; $annee <= $year_end; $annee++) { $case = sprintf("%04s-%02s", $annee, $mois); ``` ### Environment Version 17 dev ### Environment OS all ### Environment Web server _No response_ ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Environment URL(s) _No response_ ### Expected and actual behavior _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
